QuestData.Title: Han Stormstout
QuestData.Description: There will be time for mourning later. For now, there are other Stormstouts to be found.$b$bThey say that Han Stormstout was last seen exploring Kor'vess. I suspect he headed into that mantid burrow, just across the way.$b$bYou should meet me down there, $n. I don't doubt that I can handle a few mantid by myself... but I'd feel better with you by my side.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Han Stormstout in the Morrowchamber beneath Kor'vess.
QuestData.CompletionText: I think I see someone over there, but I can't seem to get across these amber beams.
QuestData.RewardText: First Evie, now Han.$b$bI was too late again.
